alert.note: Alert for Coastal Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Levy County through 745 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fowlers Bluff, or 14 miles southwest of Chiefland, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Levy County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
